title: What Happened to Kid President? | Kid President Travel Show E1

transcripts.text: In July Of 2012, I made a video with my little brother. I only meant to make one of them but it was fun. So I made another one, another one, another one and then another one. We just kept making them. And it kind of led us on a wild ride.

Well, I'm not dead. This is Kid President, Robbie Novak in the flesh. Just because someone's not on YouTube, doesn't mean they're dead. A lot of people they call me Kid President but that was just a character. In the videos I was I was pretty wild. I would dance and do stuff, crazy stuff but in real life I was honestly pretty shy then. A lot of people then would come up to me, like, hey give me a pep talk or give me a corn dog. This was so Robbie could focus on school and family and friends.
